<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/admin/logto/orgs/{lawFirmId}/members/{logtoUserId}/roles"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Idempotent replacement of org role set (e.g., ["admin"] or ["member"]).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"lawFirmId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"in":"path","name":"logtoUserId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"in":"header","name":"Idempotency-Key","required":false,"description":"Provide for safely retryable POSTs.","schema":{"type":"string","maxLength":64}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["orgRoles"],"properties":{"orgRoles":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"ReplaceMemberRolesRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
